SELECT au.phone,au.nickname,ac.content,ac.comment_id,ac.id, ac.type,date_format(ac.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime FROM `app_comment` ac LEFT JOIN app_user au on au.id = ac.user_id where 1 = 1
AND (au.phone like concat('%', #{name}, '%') OR au.nickname like concat('%', #{name}, '%'))
AND ac.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%')
ORDER BY ac.create_time desc
